Description:
Forum: http://ugx-mods.com/forum/

Infected for Black Ops 3
(NOT setgametype --- set_gametype <- right one)
To enable: /set_gametype infect in console then start your map.

If this doesn't work then start any map with the mod loaded then type /set_gametype infect;map_restart

There are 4 dvars you can use to customize the game a bit:

noenhancedmovement 0 or 1 (0 = allow enhanced movement, 1 = disable enhanced movement)
survivor_attachments 0 to 4 (up to 4 attachments allowed for both primary & secondary weapons)
survivor_specialists 0 or 1 (0 = disable survivor specialists, 1 = allow survivor specialists)
infected_equipment 0 or 1 (0 = disable infected equipment, 1 = allow infected equipment)

To spawn a bot press USE and ATTACK buttons release and repeat to spawn them. (Example being: F + Left Mouse)
Follow the source code here: https://github.com/DidUknowiPwn/Infected-T7
Thumbnail: E:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/SteamApps/common/Call of Duty Black Ops III/mods/mp_infected/zone/mod_image.png
Title: Infected
